resources.string: If I go to bed right now...
I need to wake up at...

"Sweet Dreams" is an app which calculates optimal time to sleep in order to wake up energetic and refreshed, using sleep cycles, patterns and various related data. Refer "FAQ" section to find more details about the process.

 If you like this app, please consider giving 5 stars on Google Play :)
 Your feedback is very important to the development of the app. So if you want any new features or have any problems, please let me know in the reviews. You can also contact me using the email provided.

 And finally, thank you for downloading the app!
Possible purchase error. Failed to connect to Google Play services
You must be connected to the Internet to continue. Please check your connection and tap \"OK\" to retry.
I\'m glad you\'re enjoying this app. Thank you for your donation! Your contribution to indie development is much appreciated!
As an indie developer, even the smallest donation means a lot to me. Your contributions encourage me to keep this app alive and continue to bring in more features and apps. :)
I\'ll buy my her a big chocolate
I will dedicate a lot more time and resources for this app :)
Maybe I\'ll replace my broken screen :P
You\'ll help me kick-start my own company!
